name: Infinite Shooter (itch) (RedzThief)
description:
*This projet was part of a bigger one : an escape game, this is why it's relatively simple and short*

It's a classic one, infinite screen space where you control a little spaceship with no drag and 100% inertia. You have to survive during 100 seconds, avoiding and shooting at asteroids that are coming. The asteroids waves are bigger and bigger with time.

If you finish the end may surprise you ^^.

Controls : Keyboard only

 - Move / Rotate : Arrows (up, down, left, right)

 - Shoot : Space bar
